name: Fantasy of Caocao 2
description:
25 girls(w/ CV) waiting for you!


Summon them get blessed, work them get strong girl cards
Based on your cards, build different girls party will be core of victory!

easy in, throw cards！


Only one enemy, so just throw cards!
sword, stick, core?
3 different weapon give you 3 different experience!

Cards/Gifts/Sprite/Skill infinite build!


Cards 200+
3 jobs with 20+ gifts, 3+ skill
20+ sprite to add to cards
every game is different

16 Boss coming！


Three Kingdom, Japan, Western?
Lv Bu, Liu Bei, Nobu Naga, Himiko, even demon?

Chinese/Japanese/English mix CV


fragment story made a balance between game and story
take over girls and save the world!!!

Something more

2021 summer, I start to make game for first time, a fantasy idea, which let get huge focus.
Thanks for that very much, however as a rookie game author, `s quality cant bear such huge focus.
So after launch, game and me, suffered a lot.
Besides fixing bug, I opened free refund. But, what's next?

"If give up now, game is over." -- 《Slam Dunk》

So I build a small studio, spend more time, much more money, to make
Though many people dont agree my action, bad environment, make series for a bad game, is like suicide.
But I am much more relax, uncompleted thing needs a complete quote.

Even this game is much worse than a lot great games, but I believe everyone can feel progressive？
Besides, gamers who own can get freely.
Besides, please submit bugs or advice to help us improve this game.
